mapper.sql: code, bu_name, proj_name, proj_id, proj_level, proj_time, proj_status, repo_name, repo_url, repo_time, active, total_commit
mapper.select:
select
from t_test where 1=1 and (branch_size = -1 or total_commit = -1)

select
distinct
from t_test
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_test (code,bu_name, proj_name, proj_id, proj_level, proj_time, proj_status, repo_name, repo_url, repo_time, active, branch_size, total_commit, statistic_month, create_time) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repoTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalCommit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statisticMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
